Thanks for the link.=C2=A0 It doesn't seem to really be any kind of control=
led test - just a bunch of opinions.=C2=A0 But there are some interesting c=
omments below the article, which I think are worth reading to see some of t=
he different points of view out there.

n <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:

Written b=
y Rich Montalvo =C2=A0=C2=A0

http://www.randi. org/site/ index.php/ sw=
ift-blog/ 802-the-ghost- box-challenge. html
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0I=C2=A0wou=
ldn't bother with that crap, there's no way anyone is going to get an hones=
t eval from Randi.
=C2=A0
=C2=A0To me, you judge a box, or anything else by=
 what it's personal meaning is. Do the messages have meaning and coherence,=
 or are they just random disconnected=C2=A0 words? When I here my name, and=
 the names of others through to box, I'd have to be a real duffus to think =
that was just broadcast fragments. 

=C2=A0
=C2=A0F-S

=C2=A0
